service.name: Hydrafacial

seo.title: HydraFacial® in Westfield & Carmel, IN | RELUXE Med Spa
seo.description: Cleanse, extract, and hydrate in one treatment. Pore-deep clean and instant glow with no downtime. Suitable for all skin types.

overview.p1: HydraFacial vacuums away debris while bathing skin in hydrating serums for clean, bouncy, glassy skin.
overview.p2: We customize boosters and suction levels so results look fresh and calm—even for sensitive types.
